text: John George Lathan (born 12 April 1952) is an English former professional footballer who played as a midfielder for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sunderland, Tyne and Wear Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players Category:Carlisle United F.C. players Category:Barnsley F.C. players Category:Portsmouth F.C. players Category:Consett A.F.C. players Category:Wollongong Wolves FC players Category:Arcadia Shepherds F.C. players Category:Mamelodi Sundowns F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: John Lathan
